Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments joined) of the body of a red-grey pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a burnished buff-coloured slip and remains of ten lines of black-painted hieratic accounts text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393552) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393552)
